content: these items are fun to make give an amazing result and are a welcome gift or giveaway for various purposes the pattern gives detailed written instructions for one pair of sunburst rounds that can be used as dishcloth washcloth porholder or hotpad a phototutorial supports the rounds that form the sunburst the pattern is made for advanced beginners you should be familiar with a magic_ring front post stitches double_crochet and tc and crab stitch backward single_crochet worsted weight pure cotton in 2 contrasting colors give best results for one pair dishcloths / washcloths in reverse colors you will need 20 g 0 7 oz in color a and 20 g 0 7 oz in the contrasting colour b the finished item has a diameter of approx 14 cm / 5 5 in many thanks to my committed testers vibeskat 1 and timmc 2 that did not only test the pattern but also helped me tremendously to feature this pattern in english p s included in the pattern you will find hints to make the item smaller and create a coaster 1 https //www ravelry com/people/vibeskat 2 https //www ravelry com/people/timmc
